title: To Low Elo Yasuo's
body: Please tell me what goes through your brain when you pick Yasuo. Like seriously, you have a crap KDA for the past 5 games with Yasuo and your win rate is crap. Why pick him???

replies.body: I've been spam picking him in normals because i think he is fun i want to get better at him.

Brother, you speak truth.

I'm so sick of it.

Like I always say, Youtube is the worst thing to happen to LoL. They watch these plays pulled off by professionals and they're delusional and stupid enough to think they can pull it off, but they just end up wasting four people's time.

He's an AD champ with 100% crit, many dashes, a wall that blocks all projectiles and an ultimate that OTHER PEOPLE can activate for you, he also has a regenerating shield instead of mana (which is a pretty big bonus tbh).

So if they are shit with a champ thats basically a free lane, imagine how shit they would be if they played other champs that didnt have so much going for them.

Be thankful they are playing Yasuo and not Syndra or Aniva or Kalista.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=uh0i5KHk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-23T01:28:27.817+0000)
>
> He's an AD champ with 100% crit, many dashes, a wall that blocks all projectiles and an ultimate that OTHER PEOPLE can activate for you, he also has a regenerating shield instead of mana (which is a pretty big bonus tbh).
> 
> So if they are shit with a champ thats basically a free lane, imagine how shit they would be if they played other champs that didnt have so much going for them.
> 
> Be thankful they are playing Yasuo and not Syndra or Anivia or Kalista.

I have played a lot of anivia in b3, she isnt that hard to play ultimate for wave clear and e for burst. Wall to help land q's and allow successful ganks...

I meant she is a champ that is like Aurelion Sol, she is powerful as (i play her myself) but one mistake and youre deleted instantly. So she requires a bit more thought in her play.

She is great for locking down a target and destroying them, but she is a champ with very little room for error, unlike Yasuo (who i used to main)

you need great positioning for Anivia and Sol, and if you fuck up, game over! 

But if youre Yasuo and you fuck up... well your entire kit is built to help you get in and out of sticky situations.
